direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods generate text with multiple words, but 'paragraph' generates multiple sentences.
Both methods involve generating lists of words, but 'sentence' combines them into a sentence.
Both methods generate strings of a fixed length, but 'fixedString' uses sentences to achieve this.
Both methods generate sentences with a specific length constraint.
Both methods involve generating strings, but 'characters' generates random characters instead of words.
Both methods rely on the 'resolve' method to fetch data, but 'sentence' processes it into a sentence.
